values:
this year has merely started and already it defeats last years sucky events. 

as said earlier to goatboy : "ever since i've joined the sousa section last year, i have come across drinkin a beer every weekend ever since"

my sarcasm has reached another high, i'm learning, but slowly.

my calc 2 teacher stated she had previously taught syndey lowe (the new ncsu basketball coach) a LONG time ago. I think she died, and came back to life. no really, she's like 1000.

friday night the girls and i are having a sex & the city party! that will be fun.......... thennnnnn  kickoff is this coming saturday @ 6 and i just cannot wait! on that note- the 4 new sousas this year are so freaking cool ..i love them to death!

i could clearly go for a few brewskys tonight, too bad it's 2am.   haha.........

main thing i was gonna say was.......i've been thinkin a little lately about  going ahead and getting a tattoo.  after given lots of thought and time to prepare what was going to be glued onto me for the rest of my life COMMA, i think i found the best solution....something simple yet meaningful to me and my family.  tribute to my grandmother who i miss dearly......... simply  stating "a heart of gold" with some other art  .  recently getting this idea from having her in my thoughts lately.  i'm afraid my family will go back into this depressing cycle again, but i think my mother will respect the fact that she is still in my everyday thoughts and just wish she were still alive w/ us.  alright now that we've all gotten emotional...........i will leave this with more thought.........before i do anything final. but  as expected, i will need support to get it done. i've decided to get it placed upon my back so i will most likely cry in large amounts, thus needing love from you lovely friends! :) anyway summers like disapeared ..........but sadly most of you are happy about that. so you can go back to your lives..........

until next time

i almost cried.....when i realized through all of the shit gone down you've still been there. ..and i know you heard it in my voice


i had such a stressful night......although carla and i had an entertaining chat...it really had me thinking.  i give more than 1 chance for everyone i give them an unlimited amount of chances to be my friend.  i'm such a loser i can't even begin to explain.. 

i feel SO bad that my best friend in the entire world has so much to do, is going through a hard time, and i haven't been there for her.  the fact you can say you've had 3 jobs at once is just sickening to my stomach...........we're so young yet you seem to be ageing by the minute.  

after more thinking about the navy...........if i choose to go through with it, i really hope it brings the ease of making more friends.  10 years ago all ya had to do was make a dumb joke and you were in , now you take risks........get involved w/ drugs, just tryin to show how much of a badass you really are.  i'm so scared for the future

i think i keep turning down relationships because i know i am terrified of becoming one of my friends.  i want to respect that person.....i know i'll go through a couple bad ones. but i really am so excited to find the mysterious half missing from my life. someone else who can bring laughter out of me......i'm so ready for the future


it's ironic how i feel so indecisive......frustrating , to say the least

Homework : Define Trust, Give Examples of How One Demonstrates the Trait.

hello . i'm severely stressed.

battery died at school. 3 hrs of sleep

i keep thinking back to when everything was so easy. i have no more patience.





new fact for a new day....

the new trend : girls that are now giving up on guys because "they're assholes and don't understand women" and are now claiming they're bi-sexual. not only read in a newspaper article which sort of was wild....but also heard from a friend...people are so desperate for love they decide to change their sexual preferrence....totally lame. whatever makes your heart beat.

what a weird day.


dear all of whitneys friends? i miss you.

Hm. Life is not so stellar any longer...
RULES
# 1 from now on : Stop saying Brew. 
# 2 stop asking me what Brew means, I myself, have absolutely no clue as to what it means.
# 3 Boys will be Boys?
# 4 We're very inconsistent, it should probably stop.
and Lastly # 5 Teach the brother not to snore.

As we can see, I'm not as chipper as I was yesterday.  I reconsidered the Assistant Position. Mike thinks it's a great idea, and he really thought my ideas were going to go well.  Katy applied for the 50th time, hopefully her last. (She'll get it) Did anyone happen to see the Boston College Game? Tough loss. Sorry. But anyway, I really hate it how I can hang out with my friends for a whole whopping weekend, and then next week they totally disapear. It really sucks:(. ;lkdjsjfadj School is now back to bein just breezy. I don't do anything, but pay for useless classes.  While working 40 hours of work you get the same old customers right? There are some sad movie watchers out there. I have a gentleman come in every morning right at 10 am, and he talks to me like he hasn't seen me in months. Talk about old.  We have a very big meeting at work on Friday which I'm honestly nervous as hell about! Chris (District Manager) and various other "Important People" are surveying the store. I think I'll be fine as long as they don't ask to speak to me in the back again. haha. 

Okay,it's official I need to stop popping every fhorn string possible. It's almost a new hobby!


In other news, my cat lost 2 lbs. I'm pretty sure I'm not the only releaved one. 



Anyway, Goodbye February, Hello March.

ah, kaylyn i'm so jealous that the soccer team went to savannah without me. darnit. i guess i forgot to tell you and maura that i miss you much? yeah, just a little. :) but anyway, i'm taking culinary classes next semester! i'm so excited! probably only because i get to have a chef uniform and knifes! haha you know. speaking of missing things, i miss french horn so much. so so much. i think i'm going to create my own solo ensemble and perform infront of my house every weekend. that'd be neat. gauntlet is so addicting, i sort of have to leave you, and watch. bahwhwhahhaha

now that christmas is over, other things evolve.... let me begin with the major point of discussion involving my mother.  one who has always been a great mother over all but yet tries to take advantage of my heart.  i tell her every secret, knowing it will never escape...therefore i never have to worry about it spreading around. trust, i suppose. everyday is different in this house. one day i think im moving out into an apartment, the next i'm staying here for another year. i just don't understand why this trust must be half ass.  this all collides with the topic christmas.  most families/friends just hope for their loved ones are happy. they dont want the other to get them present.. in this case these tales are all MYTHS. after having one of i suppose the best christmas' i've ever had 1'am my mother happens to just say "ya know whit, i really thought you were going to get us something for christmas." that one thing that should have never been said.  how can you honestly look me in the eye and try to make me feel guilty.  "this is your first job, i just hoped you would just get us a little something." "you're 
selfish" meanwhile 1:30 am still crying...wishing this was all a dream......it kept going.  how can this so called trust, or better yet LOVE come to this?   this may not mean anything to any of you, but after feeling like the luckiest kid in the world, having something like that said to you totally crushes that wonderful feeling.  sometimes the pain tears bring never felt so good. and sometimes, i just wish i could go to you with problems like these.  

don't get me wrong, my christmas was fabulous, i know i got everything and more than anything i honestly needed. i am indeed greatful.
after all the Everything.........i'm just so glad i can run away from everything tomorrow. it's the only road in my non-existent neighborhood. i hope you all had a wonderful holiday. 


help?

I LIED, i really like matt. we're going out to dinner this week. pretty p-siked. other than that .. carries home! i got her flowers because she had to get her wisdom teeth pulled...teeth suck! laurens still around here every now and then, always a plus. amy and i have been talkin a little bit more than normal which is really good..she's comin home real soon which should be pretty fun. lots of important things need to be said! 
+exams are over      
+i'm finally getting a raise
+HUGE check coming this week
+Christmas?!!!!!!!
+trey and i are having a hair cut frenzy sometime this week
+no more fast food for a while
+free dinner this week thanks to matthew
+no more smoking
-i miss my other half
+my dad is awesome
+Christmas?!!!!!!!!
+try-outs for raleigh plays VERY SOON!!!!!
-i miss going to church
-/+lots of rain, and still no sight of snow
+nc states bowl is in bank of america stadium, and i will be there.
-no more apartment with christa
+CHOCOLATE
+i saw the nutcracker tonight!
and      
+++++this boy i know told me i looked gorgeous tonight   

as we all know, a few negatives make a positive. that's for certain.

I still feel I can tell you anything at anytime. I'm sorry you don't feel the same way. I don't even think best friends can come near what we are...somewhere in this world their is a far better term that can signify this. In conclusion, I still have all the time in the world for anyone, there is always a 50/50 chance you're loved by me. Take the chance, and eat a fortune cookie. What can possibly be better? 


We still have a shot at a BG. I'm sort of Xcited.

Getting out of work is oh so wonderful!

Love ME.
quick question...is it bad i'm enjoying school?

ok so today is the first real day of freshman camp. and what do i do? PASS OUT! no not really but pretty close, go figure right? like i went to bed a little after 12 because i couldnt sleep and i didnt get to really eat anything that much...so that wasnt a good morning to start off on. after that we finally had our break at 11:30 instead of 12 WHOA they actually have HEARTS! yeah so me lauren and this guy named jason walked to subway. then i accidently tapped this car in the parking lot of price...but i only got black rubber on my bumper and the other car had no damage. THANK GOD i almost cried. i was soooo scared bah but yeah so now i just got back and laurens takin a shower then her room mate is coming to drop off some things also to discover laurens very bright and girly side of the room. she might kill lauren. but i think its cute, it definately suits her. i forgot that we had a music rehearsal this afternoon as well, that was actually fun because im not too shabby on tuba. yay. so we did that for a while..and now im just waitin to take a shower then im going to "the sousa" party but im slightly frightened. theyre bringing cigars and boy things. im probably going to be playing with like the curtains or something. who knows, too bad thats all my section talked about today DONT FORGET WE'RE GETTING BEER TONIGHT GUYS!! DRINK AS MUCH AS YOU WOULD LIKE! hahahhah yeah that was good. so thats at 7 soooo and early bed tonight. DUH. yeah haha have a super day. peace

--whit

I'm so confused on how to react to people now...it's weird how my emotions have been the past few months. I'm really starting to understand that people are treating me now like an adult, and I just miss being a kid. I know I can still do stupid and retarded stuff but it's just weird now and I really don't like all the responsibilities that go with the title. I keep saying I don't know who my real friends are, and I really don't. People can change just like that and it's already hit me. I've already been up and down hill with friendships.......it's just so hard to sit there and pretend like everythings okay because I know it's not. Heck, I'm not even going to a Universtiy right now an everyone else is flippin out..I don't want to lose the few friends I do have. Just scared I guess, but it's just normal. But when my "best friend" leaves for like a   month or better yet a year how am I supposed to let go like that...??? I'm very weak when it comes to saying goodbye but I guess everyone is right? anyway on to happier things! I've been driving a lot lately, definately getting the feel for the car. I think I made a good decision by practicing more with my parents, I'm actually a lot more aware of everything surrounding me. which is GREAT! haha the cars great I'm getting the window fixed on Tuesday (ThankGOD) and we're putting the new windshield wipers on soon too. New headlights coming as well! they're all fogged up now *yuck* so lifes not too darn bad! I made this deal w/ kat regarding guitars although I feel horrible about not really doing MY DEAL I suppose she's happy w/ what she decided on. I'm happy too..I would never give up an opportunity to pick up another instrument for the house :). I started drinking more fluids lately, and boy can I feel the difference....I've been peeing like every 5 seconds, it's good for you though! Gonna start going back to the gym a few times a week just to shapen up a little and just have fun with the rest of my summer....Gotta head off to Wake Tech in a while to get my books because I start school in less than a month! (yikes) but until then like I said I will be busy having a great summer soooooo have a happy week! :)

-whit

I'm so hyped up for July! I do believe I've celebrated July 4th w/ someone new every year! Jana, Leah, Amy, and now LAUREN! yesss!!! =) anyway Happy July 4th soon, and hopefully happy social security card!!! dude you don't understand when I get it, it will be elaminated and put in a GOLDEN FRAME with Electric Wires on it. dont touch it or you'll probably be executed. GOod Deal. Peace out little boys and girls.

i freaking love my parents!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ok so if you didn't know my birthday is monday but my parents got me a mustang. its pretty hot! woot convertible i dont think i spelled that right.....! :) anyway today has been absolutely fantasmic!! i woke up went to the gym at 8:30 got whipped by my trainer.........i drink too much soda........then went home slept for a little woke up at like 12 then walked to kathryns house because i promised her i would.....interesting walk might i add! and a long one! haha and then i woke her up :( again haha spent the entire day with her haha it was hilarious. anyway then my mom yelled at me to get home and i was like god shes being such a jerk!!!! then i got home and there sitting in the driveway a CARRRRRR!!!! bahhhhhh!!!!!!! i did scream a lot. i still am, inside! gosh anyway then kat carrie and i just watched or attempted at watching risky business. yep, tomorrows sunday me and dad are going out to drive = yikes!! sort of scared! and sad that i have to actually grow up and pay for my own gas :( haha oh well. anyone wanna give me there job?? have a happy sunday !!

rewind a few weeks and i was dreading going on this trip. fast forward a few and its wed. june 1 2005, i'll be flying out of rdu @ 5:30pm (hopefully) and arriving in UK @ 9 am (Hopefully). I'm more excited to go to see notre dame cathedral because thats gonna be slammin and not to mention just shopping for random things. Next trip probably Italy......, Germany, and/or Australia. if you want to come join my club and we'll be saving for about the next 5 years! cute! anyway im really bahhahwhaha! i suppose its a good feeling. although im gonna miss my friends lyke woooahh...im not gonna try not to let it bother me because ill be too busy eatin food. that was lame. haha sorry! anyway i got pissed off this morning (go figure!) because my brother took my digital camera and well he doesnt know where it is. i wasl ike WHAT THE FUCK IS WRONG WITH YOU?!!!!!!!!!!! BAHHHHH so i have no camera for europe. pisses me off. bahrhrh i hate those EFFin disposable ones because i always break them. GHEY. anyway ill SUCK IT. because i have to get through that situation. laura gave me some advice as to try all the food which i most likely will because im not too picky upon food. well wait. except when she said there was kidneys in something. whatever if the people dont tell me ill probably eat it, and enjoy. the past 2 weeks have been off the chain!!! and i wish i didnt have to drop it right here in the beginning of summer. but oh well. i really wish amy didnt freaking enherit mano because when i get back shes still gonna be layin on tha bum ! bah. i havent really done anything with her yet this summer =( sad. hopefully sometime soon though.  carrie got mad at me because i didnt want to go fishin yestaday ...but i had "packin" to do but i didnt "pack" because i just layed around. haha so i talked to kathryn until geez like 3 am. pretty crazy out da waazzzooo. but ya then i watched this crash diet show which was total and udder grossness. yayy! then i found a tootsieroll TOTALLY EXCITED! yep then crashed on treys bed EWWWW totally weird.

speaking of trey, next time i see that bitchin shelby girl im gonna beat the crap outta her. SHE GAVE HIM A HICKEY. GROSS, SLUT!!!!!!!

anyway all anger is out, i'm ready to explore and find little british boys! mmmm  Cheerio!

-whit

Downers :
-I talk to much crap, and I end up hurting peoples feelings
-I don't think
-I'm selfish when it comes to being with my friends
-I take everything for granted
-I felt unwanted at a friends house
-I haven't cried over anyone or anything like this before
-I never cleaned anything in the house since my moms been gone
-I don't like being "myself" anymore :(
-Amys parents royally hate me.
Positive :
-Kat talked to me about lots of things and made me feel good about myself even until 3 in the morning :)
-I get to be with my dad today
-I found socks that match
-I started exercising again today
-I stopped crying this morning
-I found chocolate after exercising :)
-I finally got rid of Limewire which contained many of the Viruses on this Computer (it still shuts me off sometimes)
-I've gotten to hang out with andrew a lot this weekend {He's like my best friend eeeeeevvverrr}
-I got my dressed zipped up all the way in 4 minutes!


Overall one small negative detail brought my whole week into the shitters. I keep getting told to get over it, but I'm too serious when it comes to my friends. I'm trying to be different, or rather change my ways in life so I won't be shat on anymore. I miss football, and I miss just being stupid with my friends :( everyone is changing and I don't like it. They're all leaving me in about 3 months :(

i found a lot of shoes today which makes me happy. I also found shoes for $20 at dicks so I'm def. gonna go get them. wahoo. so the end of this week is gonna be somewhat crazy. I need to write a speech for saturday...and who knows I'll probably cry. rah...I guess laurens somewhat saddened that I can't be at her house earlier in the evening but I don't yet if I can even go to her house. Soo..yeah! Sunday is gonna be HOT. mmmmm I'm getting interested as to how things will work out. Dang, my mom is making my dad take me to the dmv afterschool on friday and I know I'm gonna be there for like 80 hours. :( poop. Well I had a very relaxing/Fun day!! I feel bad in English, she probably thinks we all hate her..but we just like to sleep. haha yeah, well it's about that time. to pee of course. have a great night loves.

-Whitney

Tonight I went to the Chorus Concert. It was really good minus pitch probs with those middle schoolin youngsters. It's all good, I enjoyed myself..and Got to skip gs!!! Wahoo! peace out

-Whitney

Just to let you know I had a very eventful/Successful Day.
 -Minus- spilling nerds in my House all over the floor then proceeding to do the same in Laurens Car. I feel bad. Not only that I trashed laurens car, but I lost a lot of perfectly Good Nerds. :( Finally went back to the gym today, it was kicking my ass because I haven't been in 3 days...but walking home I felt sooo much better!! Now my back is sorta giving its normal aching. It's alright I have nothing to be sad about!

<3whitney

Today I went to my grandparents house in Raleigh. It was cool because my grandpa was talking to me a lot and he told me that he was going to give me his cornet. I was like so astonished because he always talks about how much he loved making music, and he told me he wanted me to have it because he wants to continue to be involved with music. I think it's awesome. My whole family was like all over me because I really haven't seen them since Christmas and they all said I looked really good and that they're very proud of how far I've come. It was kinda weird because they were talking about graduation like for a while and they're all really excited about it...I was just kind of agreeing to everything they said..haha. It was good to see them.

Then my dad brother and I went to Crossroads when I finally got the stupid suit! Then bought other stuff that I still needed and bought more clothes at Old Navy. I'm Happy!

After that I get a phone call from Alyssa saying she needs me to be at the Church now because Chris didn't have anyone to run the Sounds and Slides. So I'm like well I don't think I can because I'm supposed to be going to dinner with my parents. But instead my dad sped to Apex I ran to the CLC. Turns out they didn't need me. AH!!!! I hate it when he does that! I'm like seriously you could have called me! So then of course I can't leave.....but whatever it was actually really fun tonight because we were talking about how people should love others more than thinking about ourselves first. I got a warm fuzzy because I loved a person! haha mmm but yeah I had a good day.

Cruise is in 1 week. Sweet Mother.

I miss having fun. I miss just about everything I used to have...right now things aren't that great. I hope they get better though, I get stressed way too easily. Thanks jana for hangin with me lately, like seriously you're the only one that has listened to me when I had a problem and I appreciate that.  Plus I think I learned a lot about tires today. haha but you know it was fun. life is life and i'm just a kid hoping to actually be something when I grow up. I have so much to look forward to, and I really hope that I do well these next 5 years...they're really important to me. anyways, a typical update among people that I converse with: well it's really the same because everyone is still busy with there boyfriends or girlfriends but I mean I think that I'm sorta happy about being in the position that I am, because I have learned more than I would have ever thought just from my friends relationships. to tell you the truth, I honestly don't really try to impress anyone, and I don't think that's a bad thing..so I guess I think I like the way I'm living right now.
